text: Ron Campbell (26 December 1939 â€“ 22 January 2021) was an Australian animator, director, and producer. Campbell was best known for his work on the 1960s The Beatles television series and Yellow Submarine. Campbell was born in Seymour, Victoria. His career lasted from 1958 to 2008. Campbell died on 22 January 2021, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Rock Art Show * Ron Campbell Animator Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Australian animators Category:Australian movie directors Category:Australian movie producers Category:Australian television directors Category:Australian television producers Category:Writers from Victoria (Australia)
title: Ron Campbell (animator)
